text: No. 224 Group of the Royal Air Force was operational during the Cold War. 224 Group assets during January 1962: * 20 Sqn, RAF Tengah, Hawker Hunter FGA.9 * 34 Sqn, RAF Seletar, Blackburn Beverley C.1 * 45 Sqn, RAF Tengah, English Electric Canberra B.2 * 52 Sqn, RAF Butterworth, Vickers Valetta C.1 * 60 Sqn, RAF Tengah, Gloster Javelin FAW.9 * 81 Sqn, RAF Tengah, Canberra PR.7 * 110 Sqn, RAF Butterworth, Bristol Sycamore HR.14 * 209 Sqn, RAF Seletar, Scottish Aviation Pioneer CC.1 & Scottish Aviation Twin Pioneer CC.1 & CC.2 ==References== ===Citations=== ===Bibliography=== * 224
title: No. 224 Group RAF
